emultipole.help: Evaluates polarization contribution based on the Thole model
emultipole.label: calc:emultipole

multipoles.help: Polar Site Definitions in GDMA punch-file format

induce.help: Enter '1' / '0' to toggle induction on / off

first.help: First segment for which to compute site energies

last.help: Last segment for which to compute site energies

output.help: File to write site energies to. Site energies are also stored in the state file

check.help: Check mapping of polar sites to fragment

cutoff.help: Cut-off beyond which all interactions are neglected

cutoff2.help: Cut-off beyond which polarization is neglected

expdamp.help: Damping exponent used in exponential damping function

scaling.help: 1-n interaction scaling, currently not in use

calcESP.help: Enter '1' / '0' to toggle on / off. If '1', site energies will not be evaluated

grid.help: XYZ file specifying grid points for potential evaluation

output.help: File to write grid-point potential to

calcESF.help: Enter '1' / '0' to toggle on / off. If '1', site energies will not be evaluated

grid.help: XYZ file specifying grid points for field evaluation

output.help: File to write grid-point field to

calcAlpha.help: Enter '1' / '0' to toggle on / off. If '1', site energies will not be evaluated

output.help: File to write polarizability tensor in global frame and in diagonal form to

convparam.help: Convergence parameters for self-consistent field calculation

wSOR_N.help: Mixing factor for successive overrelaxation of neutral system, usually between 0.3 and 0.5

wSOR_C.help: Mixing factor for successive overrelaxation of charged system, usually between 0.3 and 0.5

tolerance.help: Convergence criterion, fulfilled if relative change smaller than tolerance

maxiter.help: Maximum number of iterations in the convergence loop
